verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> (the same is <S%H123>Edom<s%>).

Esau <S%H6215><s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>: <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>,
and <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%>.
And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%>; and <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel<s%>;

and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3274>Jeush<s%>, and <S%H3281>Jalam<s%>, and <S%H7141>Korah<s%>: these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, that were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and all his <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and all his <S%H7075>possessions<s%>, which he had <S%H7408>gathered<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; and <S%H3212>went<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>away<s%> from his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

For their <S%H7399>substance<s%> was <S%H7227>too<s%> great for them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; and the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4033>sojournings<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5375>bear<s%> them <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>: <S%H6215>Esau<s%> is <S%H123>Edom<s%>.
And these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>:

these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> were <S%H8487>Teman<s%>, <S%H201>Omar<s%>, <S%H6825>Zepho<s%>, and <S%H1609>Gatam<s%>, and <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>.

And <S%H8555>Timna<s%> was <S%H6370>concubine<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>: these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%>: <S%H5184>Nahath<s%>, and <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, <S%H8048>Shammah<s%>, and <S%H4199>Mizzah<s%>: these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3274>Jeush<s%>, and <S%H3281>Jalam<s%>, and <S%H7141>Korah<s%>.

These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>: <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H201>Omar<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>,

chief <S%H441><s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1609>Gatam<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>; these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah<s%>.

And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>: <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4199>Mizzah<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>; these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1315>Basemath<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3281>Jalam<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%>, <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, and these are their <S%H441>chiefs<s%>: the same is <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> the <S%H2752>Horite<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> and <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah<s%>,

and <S%H1787>Dishon<s%> and <S%H687>Ezer<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of the <S%H2752>Horites<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> were <S%H2753>Hori<s%> and <S%H1967>Heman<s%>; and <S%H3877>Lotan<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H8555>Timna<s%>.
And these are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%>: <S%H5935>Alvan<s%> and <S%H4506>Manahath<s%> and <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>, <S%H8195>Shepho<s%> and <S%H208>Onam<s%>.

And these are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%>: <S%H345>Aiah<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah<s%>; this is <S%H6034>Anah<s%> who <S%H4672>found<s%> the hot <S%H3222>springs<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, as he <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H2543>asses<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>.
And these are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%>: <S%H1787>Dishon<s%> and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%>.
And these are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon<s%>: <S%H2533>Hemdan<s%> and <S%H790>Eshban<s%> and <S%H3506>Ithran<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran<s%>.
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer<s%>: <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%> and <S%H2190>Zaavan<s%> and <S%H6130>Akan<s%>.
These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan<s%>: <S%H5780>Uz<s%> and <S%H765>Aran<s%>.

These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of the <S%H2752>Horites<s%>: <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6034>Anah<s%>,

chief <S%H441><s%> <S%H1787>Dishon<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H687>Ezer<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1789>Dishan<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of the <S%H2753>Horites<s%>, according to their <S%H441>chiefs<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>.

And these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> there <S%H4427>reigned<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah<s%>.
And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
And <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

And <S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad<s%>, who <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>stead<s%>: and the name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith<s%>.
And <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4957>Masrekah<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
And <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%> by the <S%H5104>River<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H1177>Baal-hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

And <S%H1177>Baal-hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H1924>Hadar<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>stead<s%>: and the name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pau<s%>; and his <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Me-zahab<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> that came of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, after their <S%H4725>places<s%>, by their <S%H8034>names<s%>: <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8555>Timna<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5933>Alvah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3509>Jetheth<s%>,
chief <S%H441><s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H425>Elah<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6373>Pinon<s%>,
chief <S%H441><s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4014>Mibzar<s%>,

chief <S%H441><s%> <S%H4025>Magdiel<s%>, <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5902>Iram<s%>: these are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, according to their <S%H4186>habitations<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>. This is <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%>.
